channel.description:
My channel has a lot of content- ghosts, zombies, randomness and lots of Sunshine! And it's not ALL SCARY! There is comedy and short films and stuff from other film makers. 

Feel free to look around...

But if you want to start just start at the very beginning of my haunted adventure, go to the playlist that says "The Original Haunting" and start there. 

My first book based on my haunted adventures released March 24, 2015 from Weinstein Books. (Yes, THAT Weinstein)! Check it out here:  http://www.amazon.com/The-Haunting-Sunshine-Girl-Book/dp/1602862729#

And for the details on my upcoming collaboration with The Weinstein Company (Yes, THAT Weinstein) here:

http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/weinstein-adapting-haunting-sunshine-girl-701365

Thanks for watching! Oh, and be sure to SUBSCRIBE to never miss a single video! And if you tell your friends about me, even better.
channel.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl Network
